committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to authorize the exchange of certain lands in the States of Nevada and Florida.
short_title: Nevada-Florida Land Exchange Authorization Act of 1986

summary.text: Nevada-Florida Land Exchange Authorization Act of 1986 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to exchange specified public lands in Coyote Canyon, Nevada, for specified private lands in Dade County, Florida. Authorizes the Secretary to sell the Florida lands to the South Florida Water Management District. Requires funds received from such a sale to be deposited in the land acquisition account of the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service. Requires that the Congress be notified of any proposed use of such funds.

titles.title: Nevada-Florida Land Exchange Authorization Act of 1986
A bill to authorize the exchange of certain lands in the States of Nevada and Florida.
